---
title: "Resume"
format:
  html:
    theme: darkly
include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <style>
        /* Resume specific styling */
        .resume-container {
          max-width: 900px;
          margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .download-section {
          text-align: center;
          margin: 2rem 0;
          padding: 1.5rem;
          background: #1e293b;
          border-radius: 8px;
          border: 1px solid #334155;
        }
        .download-btn {
          display: inline-flex;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 0.5rem;
          background: #1e3a8a;
          color: white;
          padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
          text-decoration: none;
          border-radius: 6px;
          font-weight: 600;
          transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .download-btn:hover {
          background: #1d4ed8;
          transform: translateY(-2px);
          color: white;
          text-decoration: none;
        }
        .resume-content {
          background: #1e293b;
          padding: 2rem;
          border-radius: 8px;
          border: 1px solid #334155;
        }
        .resume-section {
          margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        .resume-section h2 {
          color: #60a5fa;
          border-bottom: 2px solid #1e3a8a;
          padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
          margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        .job-item, .education-item {
          margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        .job-title {
          font-weight: bold;
          color: #e2e8f0;
          font-size: 1.1em;
        }
        .company, .school {
          color: #93c5fd;
          font-style: italic;
        }
        .date {
          color: #cbd5e1;
          font-size: 0.9em;
        }
        .skills-grid {
          display: grid;
          grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
          gap: 1rem;
          margin-top: 1rem;
        }
        .skill-category {
          background: #0f172a;
          padding: 1rem;
          border-radius: 6px;
          border-left: 4px solid #1e3a8a;
        }
      </style>
---
